sourcesContent:
const inputs=[
    {
    id:1 , 
    name:"name", 
    type:"text",
    placeholder:"product name" ,  
    label :" Name", 
    pattern:"^[a-zA-Z0-9]{4-16}$",
    errorMessage: "Product name should be 4-16 characters and shouldn't include any special character",
    required:true,
  },
    {
    id:2 , 
    name:"quantity", 
    type:"number",
    placeholder:"product quantity" ,  
    label :" Quantity",
    // errorMessage:"The product price ",
    required:true,

    },
    {
      id:3 , 
      name:"price", 
      type:"number",
      placeholder:"Product price" ,  
      label :" Price", 
      errorMessage:"The product price must be positif",
      required:true,
    }
  ]
  export {inputs }
